languages.text: "О, шерин, тогда зачем же мне отвечать правду? Ведь всякая загадка, будучи разгаданной, перестает вызывать интерес пытливого ума".
"Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."
languages.original_text: "О, шерин, тогда зачем же мне отвечать правду? Ведь всякая загадка, будучи разгаданной, перестает вызывать интерес пытливого ума".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an inquiring mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an inquiring mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an inquiring mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, shereen, ¿entonces por qué iba a revelar la verdad? Un misterio, una vez resuelto, deja de emocionar a las mentes curiosas».
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, shereen, ¿entonces por qué iba a revelar la verdad? Un misterio, una vez resuelto, deja de emocionar a las mentes curiosas».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢，亲爱的，那我有什么理由告诉你真相呢？谜团一旦解开，就不会再引起探寻者的兴趣了。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

traits.locale_text: “噢，亲爱的，那我有什么理由告诉你真相呢？谜团一旦解开，就不会再引起探寻者的兴趣了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「まあ、シャリーンったら。どうしてあたしが本当のことを教えないといけないのかしら？どんな謎も一度解き明かされてしまうと、それ以上知ろうとする気持ちが消えてしまうでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、シャリーンったら。どうしてあたしが本当のことを教えないといけないのかしら？どんな謎も一度解き明かされてしまうと、それ以上知ろうとする気持ちが消えてしまうでしょう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, shereen, pour quelle raison vous révélerais-je la vérité, dans ce cas ? Une fois élucidé, tout mystère cesse aussitôt de piquer l'intérêt d'un esprit aussi curieux que le vôtre. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, shereen, pour quelle raison vous révélerais-je la vérité, dans ce cas ? Une fois élucidé, tout mystère cesse aussitôt de piquer l'intérêt d'un esprit aussi curieux que le vôtre. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, Shereen, welchen Grund habe ich denn dann, Euch die Wahrheit zu sagen? Sobald ein Mysterium erst einmal gelöst wurde, regt es das Interesse eines neugierigen Verstands nicht länger an."
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, Shereen, welchen Grund habe ich denn dann, Euch die Wahrheit zu sagen? Sobald ein Mysterium erst einmal gelöst wurde, regt es das Interesse eines neugierigen Verstands nicht länger an."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

languages.text: "Şirinim, o zaman sana doğruyu söylemek için sebebim yok ki. Çözülmüş gizemler heyecanlarını yitirir, insanların zihninde yer etmeyi bırakır."
languages.original_text: "Oh, shereen, then what reason do I have to tell you the truth? Every mystery, once solved, ceases to excite the interest of an enquiring mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim, o hâlde sana doğruyu söylemek için ne gibi bir sebebim kalıyor ki? Çözülmüş gizemler heyecanlarını yitirir, insanların zihninde yer etmeyi bırakır."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
